Mythical Retreats

Your fantasy getaway awaits!

Welcome to Mythical Retreats, your portal to the most extraordinary vacation destinations that only exist in dreams. Whether you’re looking to relax on the sun-soaked shores of a forgotten paradise or embark on thrilling adventures through enchanted forests, we offer bespoke holiday experiences beyond the bounds of reality. Let us handle the details while you enjoy the perfect getaway to a world of wonder—no travel stress, just pure imagination.

Locations

Cliffport

A futuristic cliffside hotel suspended above the clouds, offering breathtaking views and luxury beyond the horizon.

€5000 per person

Phantom Palace

An ancient, haunted palace where restless spirits wander through lavish, eerie corridors, offering a ghostly yet luxurious stay.

€3000 per person

Tropic Pods Resort

Immerse yourself in a lush tropical paradise, staying in sleek, modern pod rooms surrounded by vibrant greenery and serene jungle sounds.

€500 per person

Elderwood Commune

A peaceful, communal treehouse village nestled high in an ancient forest, perfect for reconnecting with nature.

€300 per person
